TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit Form/ControlCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.Control/ControlCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of controls on the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示窗体中包含的控件的集合。This class represents the collection of controls contained within a form. 你可以使用方法将控件添加到窗体和方法以解除对窗体控件。You can use the method to add a control to the form and the method to remove the control from the form. 此类表示的控件集合不能创建而无需将其绑定到特定的窗体。The control collection represented by this class cannot be created without binding it to a specific form. 因此，无法创建此控件集合的多个实例，并与活动的窗体，以提供不同的控件布局交换它们。As a result, you cannot create multiple instances of this control collection and interchange them with an active form to provide different control layouts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加和控件添加到窗体的控件集合。The following code example adds a and control to the control collection of a form. 该示例需要一个窗体具有创建和命名`Form1`。The example requires that a form has been created and named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Forms.Form owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: ，包含添加到控件集合中的控件。

span.span: The to contain the controls added to the control collection.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数，可将控件的集合正确绑定到窗体以启用要添加到窗体的控件。This constructor allows you to properly bind the control collection to the form to enable controls to be added to the form. > [!NOTE] > 必须使用指定的窗体创建控件集合，因为无法创建多个集合的控件并与窗体交换它们。Because the control collection must be created with a specified form, you cannot create multiple collections of controls and interchange them with the form.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Windows.Forms.Control value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Add (value As Control)

span.span: The to add to the form.
Adds a control to the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法将控件添加到窗体。You can use this method to add controls to the form. 如果你想要向窗体中添加一组已创建控件，使用方法类。If you want to add a group of already created controls to the form, use the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加和控件添加到窗体的控件集合。The following code example adds a and control to the control collection of a form. 该示例需要一个窗体具有创建和命名`Form1`。The example requires that a form has been created and named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 不能向多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体添加控件。

span.span: A multiple document interface (MDI) parent form cannot have controls added to it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Remove(class System.Windows.Forms.Control value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Remove (value As Control)

span.span: A to remove from the form.
Removes a control from the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于删除不再需要在你的窗体的控件。You can use this method to remove controls that you no longer need in your form. 如果你想要显示控件中删除后，你将需要将控件添加回窗体使用方法。If you want to display a control after it is removed, you will need to add the control back to the form using the method. 为使控件在窗体上保持但未显示，请使用的控件属性。To have a control remain on the form but not displayed, use the property of the control.
